title: Norfolk Southern: Less Compelling Than Treasuries (NYSE:NSC)
description: Norfolk Southern's stock faces valuation challenges and limited growth prospects. Read why I advise investors to hold existing shares, and buy only at $190-$195.
content:

Over the past few years, I’ve developed a piece of software that helps me track the level of optimism and pessimism embedded in stock price.
